name: Pool Payday - Win Cash Money
description:
A twist on classic 8-ball pool where you chase the perfect high score for cash in head-to-head competitions and tournaments.

Compete for score. Your goal is to sink all the balls, but where and when you sink them is what matters most! 

No more waiting for your opponents turn. Players play the same table and the player who finishes with the most points wins.

With each ball pocketed you score more points. Run the table quickly for additional time bonuses and take home a PAYDAY … cash and prizes.

Do you have what it takes to run the table and win the pot?

Find out today for free!
